name: nextShuttle
0:
”Alexa, next shuttle.”
”Alexa, run next shuttle.”
”Alexa, open next shuttle.”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: next shuttle
des:
Wondering when the next free shuttles from Jack London Square to Downtown arrive? Just ask.

Alexa tells you when the next four free northbound Oakland, CA Broadway shuttles will arrive at Jack London Square (Broadway at 3rd Street stop). 


Example: "Alexa, next shuttle." Response: "2, 15, 20, and 44 minutes til the next shuttles arrive." 

(After hours, Alexa will inform you that no more shuttles are running.).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
